arts.ttl: Everton transfer oversight becoming even clearer as Dwight McNeil answers question
arts.sum: Everton analysis from Chris Beesley at Villa Park after the heartbreaking 3-2 defeat to Aston Villa

arts.ttl: Sean Dyche 'ready to AXE England No1 Jordan Pickford if his poor form continues', with Everton boss 'eyeing familiar face as a replacement' amid horror start to the season
arts.sum: Pickford has endured a difficult start to the season, with the Toffees having lost all four league matches so far this season and rooted to the bottom of the table.

arts.ttl: Emi Martinez reaction says it all after Jhon Duran stunner completes Aston Villa comeback
arts.sum: Aston Villa came from two goals behind to claim a sensational victory against Aston Villa in the Premier League, with Jhon Duran's long-range effort completing the comeback

arts.ttl: Unai Emery explains Jhon Duran 'challenge' as Aston Villa supersub stuns Everton
arts.sum: He also came off the bench to score Villa's second goals in each of their away victories at West Ham and Leicester City last month. "He came back on Friday and did only one training session with us after he played with his national team," Emery said of Duran after Villa's third win of the season.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery faces welcome selection headache after strikers impress in Villa win
arts.sum: Ollie Watkins bagged a brace and Jhon Duran a stunning winner in a 3-2 victory over Everton.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa's most-wanted star shows what all the fuss is about as Everton blow it again
arts.sum: ASTON VILLA 3-2 EVERTON: Jhon Duran's stunning 35-yard rocket earned Unai Emery's side a superb comeback victory after Everton stunned the home side by taking an early 2-0 lead

arts.ttl: Everton and Sean Dyche are playing a dangerous game if they cannot confront the obvious
arts.sum: The Joe Thomas verdict from Villa Park as Everton throw away a two-goal lead for the second game running as they are beaten 3-2 by Aston Villa

arts.ttl: Ollie Watkins makes comment to strike fear into Aston Villa's Premier League rivals
arts.sum: Watkins ended his eight-match run without a goal by scoring either side of half-time to level the game up at Villa Park and also show top-flight rivals that he is quickly getting back to his best form. Ollie Watkins admits he still doesn't feel 100 per cent - and despite scoring his first two goals of the season in Aston Villa's 3-2 win over Everton, the England striker was disappointed not to bag himself a hat-trick.

arts.ttl: Everton boss makes ‘killer’ point as he highlights key moment in Aston Villa defeat
arts.sum: Every mistake seems to be a goal, and every chance we don’t quite capitalise on. Villa were staring a second successive home defeat in the face, but Watkins struck his first goal of the season to halve the deficit heading into the break.

arts.ttl: What Emi Martinez did after Jhon Duran stunner as Aston Villa goalkeeper fires demand
arts.sum: Aston Villa goalkeeper Emi Martinez claims Jhon Duran has the potential to be one of the best strikers in the world if he keeps his feet on the ground. Ollie Watkins got Villa back on level terms by scoring twice either side of the break before Duran scored a brilliant winning goal.
